email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Starting freight rate is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.25 per metric ton, but that’s the best I can do. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the laycan is still October 15-20? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! Yes, the laycan remains October 15-20. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if you need any clarifications. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Please confirm the final freight rate of $51.25 per metric ton and the laycan dates. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed! The final freight rate is $51.25 per metric ton, and the laycan is October 15-20. I’ll mark the MV Ocean Star as fixed for your cargo. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
